name: Off the Clock with Women in Robotics Boston and Ava Robotics
description:
Finally, let's meet!!!
After functioning virtually since our launch, we're excited to host an in-person event at the MassRobotics office.
Join us for a socially distanced off-the-clock meetup where we can talk robots, interact with enterprising women, or simply get a reason to go out of the house!

We will have a guest speaker from Ava Robotics, Director Of Marketing, Ms. Molly Gardner to tell us more about augmentation and automation with workplace robotics.


The maximum capacity of the event is 40 people, so please RSVP and if you cannot make it, please cancel your RSVP by emailing us at womeninroboticsboston@gmail.com.
RSVP here: https://forms.gle/ZWFoiTfnPGg1Y6yk6

  • Keeping in mind the current situation, we are requesting only vaccinated members to attend.
  • Please arrive at the location 15 mins prior to the event time to find parking and give enough time to check yourself in.Â 

Subscribe to the MassRobotics newsletter to stay updated on startup news, robotics events, and much more ... https://massrobotics.us14.list-manage.com/subscribe?u=e49ee727b51b3f8daf7fdee0b&id=24ee87169f


Again don't forget to RSVP by filling out the form! See you then :-)
